headline.main: SENATOR BRODERICK.; Sketch of the Life and Political Career of the Late D.C. Broderick.

docs.lead_paragraph: A few weeks since I gave the readers of the NEW-YORK TIMES some recollections of the late MIKE WALSH, whom I had known personally and politically for several years; and I promised to follow them with a similar sketch of his old crony and co-subteranen, D.C. headline.main: Gladstone's Budget and the British Poor.

docs.lead_paragraph: The budget which has just been introduced into the British House of Commons by Mr. GLADSTONE, the Chancellor of the Exchequer, is in all respects the most important which has been framed since that famous one of 1847, which sealed the doom of the Corn Laws.

docs.snippet: The falling of rain during the morning caused a postponement for several hours of the ceremonies, and it was late in the afternoon before the procession, which extended over a half mile, was in motion.

headline.main: WASHINGTON'S BIRTHDAY.; Inauguration of Mill's Statue at Washington. Speech of Hon. Thomas S. Bocock, of Virginia Reception and Treatment of the Seventh Regiment. THE DAY IN THIS CITY. CELEBRATION OF THE UNITED AMERICANS. The Observance throughout the Country. ADDRESS. WASHINGTON'S BIRTHDAY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The falling of rain during the morning caused a postponement for several hours of the ceremonies, and it was late in the afternoon before the procession, which extended over a half mile, was in motion.

docs.snippet: As the programme prepared at Villafranca appeared for the moment to be inconsistent with the policy and known opinions of CAVOUR, he yielded to the political necessity of the hour, and resigned his place as Prime Minister to the King of Sardinia.

headline.main: COUNT CAVOUR.; Sketch of his Life and Public Career.

docs.lead_paragraph: As the programme prepared at Villafranca appeared for the moment to be inconsistent with the policy and known opinions of CAVOUR, he yielded to the political necessity of the hour, and resigned his place as Prime Minister to the King of Sardinia.

docs.snippet: We publish, to-day, a careful and accurate sketch of the origin and history of the disease which has made its appearance among us within the last few years, under the perfectly unintelligible and formidable name of Diphtheria, This sketch has been...
docs.lead_paragraph: We publish, to-day, a careful and accurate sketch of the origin and history of the disease which has made its appearance among us within the last few years, under the perfectly unintelligible and formidable name of Diphtheria, This sketch has been prepared for us by an accomplished surgeon of this City, connected with one of our largest public hospitals, ...

headline.main: OUR CITY CHARITIES--No. III.; THE FIVE POINTS HOUSE OF INDUSTRY.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Five Points and the streets adjacent have been, for half a century, the reproach and opprobrium of New-York. St. Giles, London, in its worst estate, was never a more complete cage of unclean birds than this festering plague-spot of our goodly City. Here murder and lust, drunkenness and theft, the most abject poverty and the most beastly sensuallty, joined hands.
